subject: Re: [junit] Running Ant and Junit in Visual Age
msgSnippet: Joshua, I used JUnit with VAJ 3.5. Here is some interesting information on integration JUnit into VAJ. http://junit.org/junit/doc/vaj/vaj.htm Happy holidays!!
messageBody:
Joshua,

I used JUnit with  VAJ 3.5.

Here is some interesting information on integration JUnit into VAJ.

http://junit.org/junit/doc/vaj/vaj.htm

Happy holidays!!

-Freddie

>From: Joshua Kerievsky
>Reply-To: junit@yahoogroups.com
>To: junit@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [junit] Running Ant and Junit in Visual Age
>Date: Tue, 18 Dec 2001 07:13:18 -0800
>
>
> >Is anybody running Ant and Junit under Visual Age??
>
>I'm not, but I've seen it done. In addition, a new version of Eclipse
>(http://www.eclipse.org), which is the successor to VisualAge, has a nice
>Ant plug-in.
>
>--jk
